ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
function fixNum(n) {
  return String(n)
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{7}/g, '$1.$2äº¿')
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{3}/g, '$1.$2ä¸‡')
    .replace(/\.0([ä¸‡äº¿])/g, '$1');
}

JSON.parse(String(result)).ranklist.map(o => {
  var subCateName = o.subCateName ? ' Â· ' + o.subCateName : '';
  var tags = [
    o.categoryName + subCateName,
    o.serialStatus == 0 ? 'è¿è½½' : 'å®Œç»“'
  ];
  if (o.totalClick) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.totalClick) + 'ç‚¹å‡»');
  }
  if (o.number) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.number) + 'æœˆç¥¨');
  }

  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: tags.join(','),
    last: o.updteChapterName,
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    url: 'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' + o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>
ruleExplore.name: name

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var keyword = baseUrl.match(/keyword=([^=&]+)/)[1];

var searchBooks = JSON.parse(
  String(
    java.ajax(
      'https://m.zongheng.com/h5/ajax/search?h5=1&pageNum=1&field=all&pageCount=5&keywords=' +
        keyword
    )
  )
).searchlist.searchBooks;

var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result));

var searchResults = J.select('.search-result-list').toArray();

searchBooks.map(o => {
  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: [
      o.serialStatus == 0 ? 'è¿è½½' : 'å®Œç»“',
      String(
        J.select('.bookinfo a')
          .eq(1)
          .text()
      )
    ].join(','),
    last:
      o.updteChapterName + ' Â· ' +
      new Date(o.updateTime).toISOString().replace(/T.*/, ''),
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    wordCount: String(
      J.select('.bookinfo span')
        .eq(1)
        .text()
    ),
    url:
      'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' +
      o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>

var bookId = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1];

JSON.parse(String(result))
  .chapterlist.chapters.filter(o => !o.chapterName.includes('ä½œå“ç›¸å…³'))
  .map(o => {
    return {
      name: o.chapterName.replace(/^æ­£æ–‡\s+/, ''),
      url:
        'http://huayu.zongheng.com/chapter/' +
        bookId +
        '/' +
        o.chapterId +
        '.html',
      vip: o.level > 0
    };
  });
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var og = (selector) =>
  J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content');

var book = {
  name: og('novel:book_name'),
  author: og('novel:author'),
  kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status'),
  latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name') + ' ' + String(og('novel:update_time')).replace(/(\d+-\d+-\d+).*/, '$1').replace(new RegExp('(Â·s*)?([^\\d-])?(\\d{2})?'+String(new Date().getFullYear()).slice(-2)+'-'),'$1$2'),
  cover: og('image'),
  intro: J.select('#intro p').eq(0).html(),
};

book;
</js>

function fixNum(n) {
  return String(n)
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{7}/g, '$1.$2äº¿')
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{3}/g, '$1.$2ä¸‡')
    .replace(/\.0([ä¸‡äº¿])/g, '$1');
}

JSON.parse(String(result)).ranklist.map(o => {
  var subCateName = o.subCateName ? ' Â· ' + o.subCateName : '';
  var tags = [
    o.categoryName + subCateName,
    o.serialStatus == 0 ? 'è¿è½½' : 'å®Œç»“'
  ];
  if (o.totalClick) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.totalClick) + 'ç‚¹å‡»');
  }
  if (o.number) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.number) + 'æœˆç¥¨');
  }

  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: tags.join(','),
    last: o.updteChapterName,
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    url: 'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' + o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>

<js>
var keyword = baseUrl.match(/keyword=([^=&]+)/)[1];

var searchBooks = JSON.parse(
  String(
    java.ajax(
      'https://m.zongheng.com/h5/ajax/search?h5=1&pageNum=1&field=all&pageCount=5&keywords=' +
        keyword
    )
  )
).searchlist.searchBooks;

var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result));

var searchResults = J.select('.search-result-list').toArray();

searchBooks.map(o => {
  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: [
      o.serialStatus == 0 ? 'è¿è½½' : 'å®Œç»“',
      String(
        J.select('.bookinfo a')
          .eq(1)
          .text()
      )
    ].join(','),
    last:
      o.updteChapterName + ' Â· ' +
      new Date(o.updateTime).toISOString().replace(/T.*/, ''),
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    wordCount: String(
      J.select('.bookinfo span')
        .eq(1)
        .text()
    ),
    url:
      'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' +
      o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>

<js>
var pageNum=1;
var mat=src.match(/"total_page":(\d+)/);

pageNum=mat[1];

for(var i=2;i<=pageNum;i++){
var body = "bid="+bid+"&page_size=50&page="+i;
var option={"charset": "utf-8","method": "POST","body": String(body)};
var url = "https://book.sina.cn/dpool/newbook/bookv1/ajax/get_catalog.php"+","+JSON.stringify(option);
list.push(url);
}
list
</js>

var subpath=parseInt((1999+bid)/2000);
var url="http://statics.rungean.com/static/book/zip/"+subpath+"/"+bid+".zip";
result=url;</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>(()=>{
let bk=JSON.parse(java.getZipStringContent(result,'detail.json')).data;
return {
a:bk.name,
b:bk.author,
c:bk.categoryName+','+bk.bookStatus+','+bk.score+','+bk.chapterUpdateTime,
d:bk.wordNum,
e:bk.chapterName,
f:bk.intro,
g:bk.picture
};
})()
</js>
